skills.name: Penalty
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with an axe to inflict 2 Continuous Damage effects for 1 turn with a 50% chance.

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG

skills.name: Axe of Punishment
skills.description: Throws an axe and stuns the enemy for 1 turn with an 80% chance. Recovers your HP by 30% of the inflicted damage.

skill_effect.name: Self-Heal
skill_effect.description: Heal that affects only the monster who cast the skill

skill_effect.name: Stun
skill_effect.description: Enemy is stunned and immobilized for a number of turns

skills.name: Frenzy
skills.description: Enrages and attacks an enemy target. You instantly recover a turn and prevent this attack from going on cool down with a 40% chance. When this attack is on cool down, your Attack Speed increases and you recover 10% HP every turn.

skill_effect.name: Reduce Cooltime
skill_effect.description: Reduces cool down counter of skills by 1 or more
